lics.ref:
The material is based on the following dictionary compiled at the University of Szeged, Hungary:
István Kozmác: Udmurt-magyar szótár
transducers by Giellatekno at UiT and members of the language communities. Source code available at https://victorio.uit.no/langtech/trunk/.
lics.sourcenote: The material was prepared for electronic publication by István Kozmács and Jack Rueter. This is NOT a fully styled and published dictionary. As such it can and will contain unfinished entries, unpublished entries, entries with objectionable translations, etc. If you find any errors or want to add more words, download the file, edit it, and send it back to mailto:giellatekno@hum.uit.no.
